thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Do-Good Funds Finally Are Paying Off in Performance. Will It Last?

author: Dan Weil
title: Do-Good Funds Finally Are Paying Off in Performance. Will It Last?
text:
ESG exchange-traded funds are having their day.
Over the past 10 years, ETFs with a focus on environmental, social and governance issues have fallen short of broad stock-market returns. But in the 12 months through March of this year, most ESG exchange-traded funds outperformed the broad market.
That is a promising omen for ESG funds, also...
